text: ya eyyuhe-nnebiyyu iza caeke-lmu'minatu yubayi`neke `ala el la yusrikne billahi sey'ev vela yesrikne vela yeznine vela yaktulne evladehunne vela ye'tine bibuhtaniy yefterinehu beyne eydihinne veerculihinne vela ya`sineke fi ma`rufin febayi`hunne vestagfir lehunne-llah. inne-llahe gafurur rahim
